column1: # I changed quite a lot of definitions because it Polylines higher than 0x2c (maybe 0x2a is even the last one still rendered) don't seem to be compatible - either to mgkmap in general or to the preproces.pl file. Therefore all polylines are used up.
# 0x20-0x25 are reserved for elevation and depth contourlines
# unsure wether 0x2b and 0x2c are rendered or not. Above is NOT rendered.
